About the role:The role offers:The role offers an opportunity to work on ServiceNow implementation projects and gain experience in developing and customizing ITSM solutions.
It provides exposure to various ServiceNow modules, integration techniques, and best practices.
The developer will have the chance to collaborate with a team of professionals and contribute to the successful delivery of ServiceNow solutions that improve IT service delivery and enhance the overall user experience.Responsibilities:Implement ITSM solutions using ServiceNow platform based on industry best practices.
Develop and customize ServiceNow applications, workflows, forms, and UI components.
Scripting and configuration of ServiceNow modules, including Business Rules, Script Includes, Fix Scripts, UI Actions, UI Policies, Client Scripts, and Email Inbound actions.
Design and create Service Portals and widgets to enhance user experience.
Integrate ServiceNow with other systems using REST and SOAP APIs, and create scripted REST and SOAP APIs as needed.
Manage authentication via AUTH 2.0, certificates, and Mid Server.
Work with domain-separated instances of ServiceNow.
Install and manage MID Servers for data integration and management.
Develop custom applications on the ServiceNow platform.
Implement LDAP/Active Directory/SSO integration.
Support Orchestration use case implementations.Essential Skills:Strong hands-on development experience with ServiceNow scripting and customization.
Proficiency in ServiceNow modules and components.
Experience with REST and SOAP integrations and API creation.
Knowledge of authentication mechanisms and Mid Server management.
Familiarity with custom application development on the ServiceNow platform.
Understanding of LDAP/Active Directory/SSO implementation.
Experience with Orchestration use cases.Essential Qualifications:Minimum of 4 years of experience with ServiceNow.
Minimum of 4 years of experience in the IT industry.
Certification as a ServiceNow System Administrator.
